name: Pangeon
description:
Pangeon is a single player roguelike inspired by dungeon crawler classics. Dive right into a randomly generated dungeon in search for a deadly artifact to save the planet from total annihilation.
Fight your way through to the bottom of the so-called Pangeon - an organisation located in a dungeon that we know very little about (well, except the fact it contains something that has the potential to destroy the entire planet Earth), however we'll find out more as our journey goes on!

  • A mix of many roguelike games combined into a fun experience
  • +15 randomized levels, various in looks, enemies and loot
  • +20 weapons to use - ranging from daggers, swords and ending on magic staffs, bows etc.
  • Craft your own items, weapons and armors
  • Plenty of magic to learn and use against your enemies
